textLoad:
Functions:
Movement: (wsad)
ChangeSlot: 1/2 (+/ě)
Attack: f
DropItem: q
Interact e
ESC: esc (Its used for opening end closing this menu.
If you want to close this menu use esc command again)

Objective:
Your main goal is to fight trough the maze. Then find exist.
This maze contains 10 levels, each with many dangers to face.

Story:
One day, the player is walking down the street when suddenly someone kidnaps him.
After a long time, he wakes up, but the last thing he remembers is going for a walk.
Now he has woken up in some musty room and has no idea how to get out.
In the room there is only a bed, a chest, a door, and lots of dirt.

The player decides to open the chest. It doesn’t seem to be locked.
And finally, luck smiles upon him — inside he finds a sword.
With it, he pries open the locked door and enters another room.
 It looks like a sewer or some kind of tomb. It certainly smells like one.

Here begins the player’s adventure, in which he explores dungeons and tries to escape back to the surface.
Along the way, traps and enemies await him, making his journey much more difficult.
 He may also encounter a merchant who sells three random items in exchange for gold coins.
The player continues moving through rooms until he reaches the exit of the dungeon.
If the player dies, the game ends. If he fights his way to the end, he wins and escapes from the dungeons.

If you seek help, try writing esc.
